snippet.title: The First Berserker: Khazan - Gameplay Reveal | Xbox Partner Preview
snippet.description:
The First Berserker: Khazan's latest trailer has been revealed on Xbox Partner Preview stream.
Check out the first-ever in-game boss fight trailer now! 

The First Berserker: Khazan is a single-player hardcore action RPG based on the Dungeon & Fighter universe, enjoyed by more than 850 million users worldwide, and is scheduled to be released on PS5 and Xbox Series X & S.

Official website – https://khazan.nexon.com
Twitter –  https://twitter.com/PlayKhazan

#TheFirstBerserkerKhazan #Khazan #hardcoreaction #RPG #XboxPartnerPreview #DNF #DNFUniverse
